quality.reason: Rooms are clean, modern, and well-appointed, though some guests noted smaller sizes and occasional maintenance issues.

location.reason: Situated in the heart of the University of Pennsylvania campus, ideal for visitors to UPenn or Drexel.

service.reason: Staff are praised for professionalism and attentiveness, with occasional reports of inconsistent service.

safety.reason: Located in a well-trafficked university area, though some concerns about valet parking practices were noted.
